front.title: Analysis of the Core-Edge Separation architectures considered by the RRG in 2010

abstract.t: This ID will contain my analysis of the Core-Edge Separationarchitecture (CEE) scalable routing proposals considered by the RRGin 2010, as well as some other CES architectures. This ID is tosupport and document the IRTF Routing Research Group discussionsconcerning scalable routing, in early 2010. It is not a formalproduct of the RRG. To what extent its contents are supported by RRGconsensus can only be determined by the co-chairs.
